# CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.cinematic

**Case**

Isolates the ambience and place it in a spatial stem. Isolates all voices and place them in a mono stem.

## Declaration

```swift
case cinematic
```
title: CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.cinematic
